description:
Chihiro`s school is having open house, but will he work up the nerve to ask Madoka? He also has to write an essay about his future dreams to present.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Apprendre ne se fait pas en un jour
Gakumon wa Ichinichi ni Shite Narazu
Learning Does Not Happen in a Day
学問は一日にしてならず
